data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tirap, Arunachal Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tirap, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Tirap, Arunachal Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 1,232 believers in the county of Tirap to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Tirap unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, please remember the Assamese (Muslim traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Tirap, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,232 believers in Tirap to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 110,768 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Tirap to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: Tirap
location.people_groups_list: Bhotia Tibetan, Tai Darai, Dakpa, Chepang, Mahara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bhotia Tibetan (3,300), Tai Darai (400), Dakpa (100), Chepang (1,000), Mahara (4,800)
